essential_for_most_projects.description: These features provide core functionalities for managing flow control and user interaction.

easy.title: Customizable Prompts
easy.description: Allows defining different messages for pause, resume, and skip actions, along with formatting options.

easy.title: Restarting
easy.description: Enables restarting the flow from a specific position within the iteration.

medium.title: Conditional Pausing
medium.description: Introduces custom functions or lambdas to pause the flow based on item content or loop state.

medium.title: Progress Tracking
medium.description: Displays remaining items, estimated time to completion (ETA), or progress bars with customization options.

medium.title: Flexible Stepping
medium.description: Allows forward/backward/n-step movement within the flow, with an option for continuous stepping mode with a delay between items.

medium.title: Iteration Modes
medium.description: Offers configurable modes like continuous, break-on-error, or stop-on-skip.

medium.title: Customization
medium.description: Allows customizing pause/resume/skip keys, user prompts, and message formatting functions.

features_for_more_complex_projects.description: These features are valuable for projects handling large datasets, complex conditions, or requiring more granular control.

medium.title: Granular Batch Processing
medium.description: Enables dynamic batch size control and pausing/stopping after each batch for memory management or resource-intensive operations.

medium.title: Advanced Logging
medium.description: Provides configurable logging levels and detailed event logging (pause/resume/skip, user input, errors) for debugging and monitoring.

medium.title: Flexible Timeouts
medium.description: Sets timeouts for user input during pauses, with automatic actions (resume/skip/stop) after timeout to prevent stalls.

medium.title: Callback Functions
medium.description: Allows triggering custom logic at specific events (pause, before skip, resume) for advanced flow control.

medium.title: Conditional Iteration
medium.description: Enables skipping or modifying items based on conditions within the loop for selective processing or data transformation.

medium.title: In-place Modification
medium.description: Allows direct modification of items within the loop (potentially with confirmation prompts) for data transformation within the flow (use with caution).

medium.title: Mapping
medium.description: Provides functionality to apply custom functions to each item as it's processed for data manipulation.

medium.title: Accumulation
medium.description: Helps calculate sums, averages, or other aggregations during iteration for summarizing data while processing the flow.

medium_hard.title: Robust Error Handling
medium_hard.description: Implements custom exception handling logic, including retry attempts with backoff strategies for handling unexpected errors and preventing failures.

medium_hard.title: Context-Aware Pausing
medium_hard.description: Integrates with external libraries for context monitoring (network/file I/O). This allows automatic pausing/resuming based on external conditions like network availability or disk space.

medium_hard.title: Performance Optimization
medium_hard.description: Optimizes performance for large datasets or complex conditions through techniques like lazy evaluation and batch processing to improve efficiency.

features_for_highly_specialized_projects.description: These features cater to highly specialized projects with unique requirements or integrations with external systems.

medium_hard.title: External Data Sources
medium_hard.description: Allows integration with databases/APIs for data retrieval and processing within the flow.

medium_hard.title: Serialization/Deserialization
medium_hard.description: Enables saving and loading flow state (paused position, skipped items) for resuming later.

medium_hard.title: Dynamic User Input Filtering
medium_hard.description: Filters items based on real-time user input during iteration for interactive processing.

hard.title: Contextual Pausing
hard.description: Offers the most advanced context-aware pausing behavior based on real-time factors through integration with external libraries.

hard.title: Conditional Branching
hard.description: Allows defining different processing paths within the flow based on criteria for complex decision-making.
